attributes.title: Your Conscious Intention Of You Is Only Your Living Identity!
attributes.description:
16 AUGUST 2020

*PARAMASHIVAâ€™S DIRECT MESSAGE FROM KAILASA:

*CONSCIOUS INTENTION OF YOU IS THE HIGHEST TRUTH, THE REALITY, THE CORE, THE BLUEPRINT OF YOUR EXISTENCE. SO, CONSCIOUS INTENTION ONLY IS THE LIVING IDENTITY OF YOU AS PER KAILASA.

*THIS IS MOST HEALING,SWEETEST MESSAGE I RECEIVED FROM PARAMASHIVA. THIS WHOLE MESSAGE WAS MAPPED INTO ME BY THE GRACE OF GANAPATI.PARAMASHIVA JUST DOWNLOADED AS A PURE MESSAGE AND MANIFESTED IT IN MULTI LEVEL.

*THIS TRUTH FORMS THE CORE BASIS OF OUR PHYSICAL, MENTAL, EMOTIONAL, SPIRITUAL REALITIES, ECONOMIC POLICIES, EVERYTHING.

*YOUR FEET AND FACE BOTH ARE VERY MUCH PART OF YOU. BUT YOU FEEL YOU ARE MORE ALIVE IN YOUR CHEEKS, EYES, TONGUE THAN IN YOUR FEET. IT IS BECAUSE THE DEGREE OF YOUR EXISTENCE, THE PERCENTAGE OF YOUR MANIFESTATION PSYCHOLOGICALLY, EMOTIONALLY DIFFERS.

*YOU EXIST MORE IN YOUR CONSCIOUS INTENTION THAN YOUR MOOD SWINGS, UPS, DOWNS, HORMONES, CHEMICAL IMBALANCE AND REACTIONS OF THOSE IMBALANCES.

*YOU ALL KNOW HOW YOU LOOK, YOUR BLUEPRINT, IN YOUR WAKING STATE BY SEEING THE MIRROR. TRY TO DO THIS SIMPLE ANALYSIS: REMEMBER AT LEAST LAST THREE OR FOUR TIMES YOU DREAMT ABOUT YOU. IN ANY DREAM YOU EXIST. SO TRY TO VISUALISE, RECALL HOW YOU LOOK - THE SIZE, SHAPE, HOW YOU FEEL ABOUT YOURSELF IN THE DREAM STATE. THAT IS THE BLUEPRINT OF YOU IN THE DREAM STATE.

*IN REALITY, HOW YOU WILL BE IN THE TURIYATITA-TURIYATITA, IS YOUR CONSCIOUS INTENTION. THAT IS THE HIGHEST REALITY OF COSMOS.

*I WILL EXPLAIN IT TO YOU MORE JOVIALLY: ALMOST 90% OF YOU REPENT ABOUT HOW YOU LOOK IN YOUR PASSPORT PHOTO. ALMOST 100% OF YOU VOMIT WHEN YOU SEE HOW YOU LOOK IN YOUR AADHAR CARD! HOW YOU LOOK AND HOW YOU FEEL ABOUT YOUR BLUEPRINT IN VARIOUS STATES DIFFERS.

*HOW YOU WILL LOOK IN KAILASA IS YOUR CONSCIOUS INTENTION - YOUR SATYA SANKALPA.

*DEMARCATIONS OF PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE DOES NOT HAVE IMPACT ON YOUR CONSCIOUS INTENTION.

*YOU THINK THE PRESENT CONDITION OF YOUR BODY IS EITHER ROGIC - UNHEALTHY OR BOGIC - DESTROYING, BUT NOT YOGIC. MAYBE IF YOU BECOME SINCERE IN FUTURE, YOU CAN BECOME YOGIC. THESE ARE THE THOUGHT CURRENTS THAT USUALLY RUN IN YOUR MIND.

*NOW I AM MAKING A STATEMENT: IF YOU CONSCIOUSLY DECIDE TO HAVE A YOGIC BODY, AND IF YOU CREATE A SATYA SANKALPA - INTENTION, THAT BECOMES YOUR EXISTENCE IN YOUR TURIYATITA-TURIYATITA; THE HIGHEST PARAMASHIVA STATE. WHEN THAT STARTS INFLUENCING IN YOUR PRESENT CONDITION, THE DEMARCATION OF THE PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE WILL JUST BECOME A FADED DELUSORY MEMORY.

*YOU WILL START MANIFESTING MORE AND MORE YOUR PURE SATYA SANKALPA - SHIVA SANKALPA. THAT IS WHY IN PUJA WE SAY: MAMA SANKALPAM SHIVA SANKALPAM ASTU! IT MEANS: LET MY SANKALPA BECOME SHIVA SANKALPA.

*WHAT I AM REVEALING NOW HAS MULTIPLE AMAZING IMPLICATIONS, ESPECIALLY FOR THE DISCIPLES WHO ALREADY FEEL A DEEP TRUST IN ME. WHENEVER YOU FEEL A DEEP TRUST ON ME, YOU DON'T HAVE TO WASTE THE NUMBER OF LIVES I WASTED.

*IN KAILASA, YOUR INTENTION MATTERS. DEMARCATION OF THE PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE IS DELUSION. THE MOMENT YOU CONSCIOUSLY DECIDE - I AM YOGIC BODY WITH ABSOLUTE HEALTH, FLEXIBILITY, ALL THE BEST THINGS AND DIVINE DIVYA SHAREERA. THAT CONSCIOUS INTENTION PHOTOGRAPH IS ONLY MADE IMMEDIATELY AS YOUR PASSPORT PHOTO IN KAILASA!

*IN KAILASA, YOUR PASSPORT ID WILL BE YOUR SATYA SANKALPA! BECAUSE IN KAILASA YOUR PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE IS LESSER REALITY. THE DEMARCATION OF THE PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE IN KAILASA. TIME IS A CANVAS - PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE IS JUST DEMARCATION.

*THIS DEMARCATION IS LESSER REALITY THAN YOUR SATYA SANKALPA. IF YOU HAVE A DOUBT "HOW I WILL LOOK IN KAILASA PASSPORT?" YOUR CONSCIOUS INTENTION, SATYA SANKALPA IS THE WAY YOU EXIST IN KAILASA.





*PLEASE INTERNALISE VERY DEEPLY BECAUSE THIS TRUTH HAS MULTILAYER IMPLICATION!

*YOUR BEING IS LAYER BY LAYER - LIKE AN ONION. THE DEEPEST LAYER IS YOUR CONSCIOUS INTENTION; SATYA SANKALPA! NEXT LAYER ONLY IS TIME - KAALA, WHICH HAS DEMARCATION OF PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE.

*I AM EXPLAINING THIS PRINCIPLE WITH ONE EXAMPLE BASED ON YOUR BODY. FOR EXAMPLE, YOUR BODY IS UNHEALTHY, ALMOST ALL THE TIME, EITHER TIRED, BORED, DEPRESSED OR SICK. BUT CONSCIOUS INTENTION OF YOU IS TO BE YOGIC, ABSOLUTELY POWERFUL, FLEXIBLE, WELL BUILT, DELICIOUS TO LIVE IN.

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4234250823329402
